column2: Tuesday. New undergraduate student orientation begins
Monday. Labor Day. Classes in session
Friday. Last day for reporting midsemester grades
Thursday. Regular class meeting schedule begins
Monday. Martin Luther King, Jr. Day holiday: classes are rescheduled on Wednesday, January 8
Wednesday. Last day to withdraw with W from Spring 2014 classes (Undergraduates Only)
Wednesday. Registration begins for Fall 2014; Summer 2014 registration continues
Friday. Registration ends for Fall 2014; Summer 2014 registration continues
Wednesday. Undergraduate reading period (9 a.m. - 2 p.m.)
Sunday. Graduation exercises; conferring of degrees
Admin adding members to the groupme
The day the internet went out…
